metadataAttributes.Title: Data Visualization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Combine data, visuals, and narrative to tell impactful stories and make data-driven decisions.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Storytelling, Data Visualization Design, Animated Data Visualizations, Chart Types, Data Limitations and Biases, Tableau Storypoint, Tableau Interactive Dashboards, Tableau Visualizations, Tableau Data Pane, Flourish, Business KPIs, Issue Trees
